2,530 SF STAND-ALONE BUILDING
CBRE has been retained to sublease a 2,530 SF retail/medical/office space at 955 Sullivan Avenue located in South Windsor, Connecticut. Landlord
offers direct long term lease.

2,530 SF sublease space available, plus 2,530 SF lower level
Built in 1990
Sublease Term Through: March 31, 2020
Sublease Rate: $18.00/SF, plus utilities
modified gross

Offering for lease between 1,250-5,000 SF
of office, retail or medical space at 1336 East Main Street in Meriden,
Connecticut.
Area retailers innclude: Ion Bank, Huxley’s Diner, Family Dollar, Taino,
Ocean State Job Lot, Midstate Medical Center, Liberty Bank, Wells
Fargo, TD Bank and Season Federal Credit Union.

Wintonbury Mall a 110,578 SF shopping center is located in the center of Bloomfield’s downtown located at 836 Park Avenue in Bloomfield, Connecticut.  

• 590-15,000 SF retail space
• 9.08 acres
• ±600 parking spaces
• On-site restaurants
• Built in 1980
• 12' ceiling 
• BCD zoning
• Nearby amenities include CVS, US post office, Bloomfield Town Hall, the Town Library, Subway, etc. 
• Asking Lease Rate: $10.00-$16.00/SF NNN

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The building is located in the center of Hamden and offers excellent access to Interstate 91 and Route 15, and is within minutes of downtown New Haven.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to offer up to 4,570 SF for lease at Hamden Center Three, a two-story, retail and office building located at 2313-2315 Whitney Avenue in Hamden, Connecticut.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Up to 4,000 SF of Retail and/or Office Space Available

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to offer for lease a 2,795 SF restaurant and 2,795 SF lower level, along with a large outside patio at 300 West Main Street in Avon. The restaurant comes equipped with a full kitchen and hood system already in place, beautiful counter with open seating / prep area, large bright interior seating area with high-end decorative finishes, and fenced in outside patio area. The lower level has additional prep, storage, office area, and can be leased with the restaurant, or separately to another tenant, like a caterer or “ghost kitchen” user. There is a pizza oven and large cooler/ freezer in place (also available for lease/purchase at an additional cost).

Signage opportunities include monument signage on Route 44, building signage above tenant’s entrance, lit signage near outside patio. Join New England Pasta Company, BeanZ & Co., and Ingnite Fitness, as well as nearby - Marshall’s, Fresh Market, Panera, and soon Whole Foods. Other surrounding luxury retailers include a Spa, Massage, and other high-end stores nearby among many others servicing the Farmington Valley.

• LEASE RATE:

First Floor:   $20.00 SF/NNN (Restaurant)

Lowel Level: $8.00 SF/NNN
                    NNN’s $7.89-$11.89/SF (depending on final square footage)

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: For Lease a 2,795 SF Restaurant and 2,795 SF Lower Level
